reviews.review_msg: Personally found his class quite easy, only watched his lectures online and aced quizzes regularly. Had a decrease in grade in the final exam and project, however the weekly quizzes basically offset the falloff at the end. There is memorization in this class but memorizing it all was easy once you got a hang of it.

He's a nice person, but I really hated how this course was structured. There was supposed to be 2 hours of lecture followed by an hour of asynchronous learning. The 2 hours of class was just us doing the quiz, and answering online review questions on the recorded lectures. It felt like a total waste of time, and that he got of really teaching.
